OOC:  Dewboy, what in the blue hell is your problem, you sssssick freak!  E=
veryday you post crap on NBWRPG!  Be warned, everybody!  Now that I'm back,=
 there's No Way Out!  Oh, and I hope nobody has a problem with my latest tr=
ansformer...

BIC:   

An oasis lay in a hot, arid desert in Africa.  Now, =
this wasn't any old oasis.  Oh no, this oasis was different.  Something was=
 ready to rise up.  The sky in the desert started to turn into a dark, twil=
ight purple.  The water of the oasis started slowly turning, but then it gr=
ew into a violent, raging swirl.  The sky grew grimmer and grimmer.  A forc=
eful wind swept across the wind, and tore the two trees at the oasis right =
out of the ground.  And finally, WHAM!  A huge bolt of lightning struck the=
 water!  The water stopped swirling, and the wind stopped as well.  The sky=
 went back to it's sunny self.  Everything was quiet.  It was quiet, howeve=
r, until the ground started rumbling.  Suddenly, there was a huge explosion=
, and water and sand flew everywhere!  And once the dust settled, there was=
 flames in the empty oasis, and in the flames was a large robot.......a tra=
nsformer.  The transformer's plating was all red, and on his chest and legs=
, there were the shape of flames coloured black.  The transformer's left ar=
m was not red, however, and was just silver.  The transformer's face was re=
d with black stripes going diagonally downward to the left.  On his right h=
and, he had a strange black glove, and on the left hand, a black wrist guar=
d thing.  The transformer walked out of the fire, and pulled his glove down=
.  Then, the transformer slowly said, "I am........Kane......."
